Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 18th overall pick, by St. Louis in 2010...
Injured on 5/16/2010 with a Bruised Heel, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/17/2013 with a Sore Back, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 7/2/2013 with a Pulled Rib Cage Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Had first career hit on 4/8/2014, off Darren O'Day (MIL)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/12/2014, off Justin Duchscherer (PIT)...
Drove in 6 runs against Houston on 5/14/2014...
Drove in 8 runs against Florida on 9/16/2018...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/8/2020, hitting .476 with 4 HR, 12 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/24/2021, hitting .440 with 5 HR, 15 RBI...
Traded from St. Louis to Oakland on 7/31/2021 (Going to OAK: RF M. Choice. Going to STL: P H. Genpaku)...
Won World Championship with Oakland in 2023...
Signed as a free agent by Seattle on 2/2/2024 to a 2-year deal worth $3,150,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Kansas City on 9/18/2024...
